channel.title: Statistics on krohitm's blog
channel.description: Recent content in Statistics on krohitm's blog

item.title: Exploratory Data Analysis
item.description: library(ggplot2) library(extraDistr) library(tidyverse) ## Loading tidyverse: tibble ## Loading tidyverse: tidyr ## Loading tidyverse: readr ## Loading tidyverse: purrr ## Loading tidyverse: dplyr ## Conflicts with tidy packages ---------------------------------------------- ## filter(): dplyr, stats ## lag(): dplyr, stats ## rdunif(): purrr, extraDistr #library(plotly) The data source is obtained from https://www.cdc.gov/nchs/nsfg/nsfg_cycle6.htm This contains fixed width files, and stata dictionaries consisting of columns for the data files #helper function to parse Stata dictionary dct.
